name: 御妖令
description:
The promotion of heaven and earth failed, energy was lost, and the protagonist traveled to this world, with a companion golden finger, which can devour pet genes to evolve continuously, continuously improve the race value and quality, obtain the rule fragments of this world, and control the world.

1. Pet system:

There are more than 650 kinds of monsters and beasts in the game. You can drop pet eggs when you fight monsters. Every monster can be kept as a pet, including bosses.

2. Achievement system:

Tiandijian collects achievements, players can collect pets non-stop, unlock achievements, obtain achievement attribute bonuses, and improve combat effectiveness

3. Fishing system:

Players can drop fishing materials while fighting monsters. Through fishing, they can catch different treasures, including pet eggs, skills, and beasts, including various materials

4. Tongtian Tower:

Players can challenge the Babel Tower in different ways. The Babel Tower is full of bosses, endless tower climbing, infinite mode,

5. Combined pet system:

Pets can strengthen pet stars by devouring the genes of other pet eggs. There is no upper limit for pet stars. You can strengthen a very garbage pet into a powerful beast

6. Boss battle:

Players fight in the wild to slaughter creatures on a large scale, which will attract the hatred of the BOSS and lead to the revenge of the BOSS. Players can then fight the BOSS, or meet the BOSS randomly in the wild

7. Task system:

Players can get various rewards including pet eggs after completing tasks

8. Equipment system:

Equipment drops randomly, random random, equipment characteristics of various qualities

9. Skill system:

There are about 200 kinds of attribute skills, players can match them as much as they want

10, on-hook, sound, automatic equipment selection, etc.
